title: Hand in Ash
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B085Z5KGQ7The world is in danger.The murders aren’t random. They have a vile purpose.Sora Suen is determined to stop them.But life likes to throw obstacles in her way.One of them is Voss Jane.He can’t can't make up his mind about whether she's the enemy or an ally, and she refuses to do it for him.Then there are the real bad guys.More and more are crawling out of the woodwork, and all of them have one focus.Her.But Sora isn’t afraid of them.She has herself, and she has Devil.Together they’ll burn them all to ash.
author: Zoe  Parker
